DOC.detailed_description: Preeclampsia pregnancy-specific multisystem disorder unknown etiology . The disorder affect approximately 10 percent pregnancy worldwide constitute one great cause maternal perinatal morbidity mortality worldwide . ( 1 ) Preeclampsia define new onset elevate blood pressure 20 week gestation . It consider severe blood pressure increase substantially symptoms end-organ damage ( include fetal growth restriction ) occur . There single reliable , cost-effective screen test preeclampsia , well-established measure primary prevention . Management onset labor include close monitoring maternal fetal status . Management delivery include seizure prophylaxis magnesium sulfate , necessary , medical management hypertension . Delivery remain ultimate treatment . Preeclampsia lead eclampsia . Symptoms preeclampsia include : weight gain , headache , right upper quadrant pain , swell hand foot , vision problem Symptoms eclampsia include : muscle ache pain , seizure , severe agitation , unconsciousness Current obstetric treatment United States result shift eclampsia toward postpartum period , case see late post partum . During post partum period patient 's blood pressure peak around 3-6 day post delivery , however patient discharge home 48 hour . This result re-admission hospital woman . The investigator 's goal review evaluate woman readmitted preeclampsia eclampsia episode post partum period ass precede sign symptom lead admission .
